word_mean: 〔同分〕异构〔现象〕：两种或两种以上分子式相同的不同化合物之间的关系，即互为异构体及互为异构现象。可分成两大类：结构异构(structural isomerism)和立体异构(stereoisomerism)

sentence.Network_en: The team'stereoisomerism " however, is generally restricted to mirror image isomerism.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而 “ 立体异构”一词通常只限于镜象异构.

sentence.Network_en: A rather more complex case is that of steric isomerism.
sentence.Network_cn: 更复杂的情形是立体异构问题.

sentence.Network_en: It realized the isomerism form to have the auto - adapted wireless sensor network long - distance information monitor.
sentence.Network_cn: 实现了异构形式的具有自适应性的无线传感器网络远程信息监测系统.
